Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER is followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER across all process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER in variants that complete successfully (i.e., end with Payment Handled) versus those that end in rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are immediately preceded by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events that occur in cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of process variants containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that result in a rejection by PRE_APPROVER compared to variants containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION that result in rejection by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of successful paths (ending in Payment Handled) after Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER versus after Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that directly lead to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER without rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER appears in variants that include at least one rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER out of all approval-related activities (including Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total number of approval handovers in the log
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are part of re-submission cycles (i.e., preceded by any Declaration REJECTED activity)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER occurrences per year to detect temporal trends
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
